verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] dismantling an Obama - era program that , in part , allows for hundreds of thousands of young undocumented immigrants to remain in the country .
[ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: dismantling] [ARG1: an Obama - era program that , in part , allows for hundreds of thousands of young undocumented immigrants to remain in the country] .

The Trump administration is dismantling [ARG0: an Obama - era program] [R-ARG0: that] , [ARGM-ADV: in part] , [V: allows] [ARG1: for hundreds of thousands of young undocumented immigrants to remain in the country] .
The Trump administration is dismantling an Obama - era program that , in part , allows for [ARG1: hundreds of thousands of young undocumented immigrants] to [V: remain] [ARG3: in the country] .
